0.text: and/ but/or We can combine sentences using and / but / or.
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>and/ but/or We can combine sentences using and / but / or.</prosody></speak>

1.text: The earth cooled down. The earth cooled down and hardened. The earth hardened. Early humans hunted. Early humans hunted and gathered food. They gathered food. The land, sea and atmosphere began to form. The land, sea and atmosphere began to form but there was no life on Earth. There was no life on Earth. You can read the book. You can read the book or watch the DVD. You can watch the DVD.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The earth cooled down. The earth cooled down and hardened. The earth hardened. Early humans hunted. Early humans hunted and gathered food. They gathered food. The land, sea and atmosphere began to form. The land, sea and atmosphere began to form but there was no life on Earth. There was no life on Earth. You can read the book. You can read the book or watch the DVD. You can watch the DVD.</prosody></speak>

4.text: Combine the sentences using and / but / or.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Combine the sentences using and / but / or.</prosody></speak>

5.text: 1. Early people lived in caves. They painted pictures on the walls.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. Early people lived in caves. They painted pictures on the walls.</prosody></speak>

6.text: 2. Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone in 1876. It was very different from the phones we use today.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2. Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone in 1876. It was very different from the phones we use today.</prosody></speak>

7.text: 3. In the Stone Age people didn't build houses. They did not use metal tools.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>3. In the Stone Age people didn't build houses. They did not use metal tools.</prosody></speak>

10.text: Speak in groups about the journey of human civilization. Take turns and speak at least one sentence. Make use of the given facts. You may combine sentences.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Speak in groups about the journey of human civilization. Take turns and speak at least one sentence. Make use of the given facts. You may combine sentences.</prosody></speak>
